text: @marklevinshow Wait, wait hold up @BarackObama took medicine prescribed as it was meant to be used as an anti-malarial fully 12 years BEFORE COVID-19 was discovered? And you, somehow, think this makes some sort of point? Bahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha
